name: test-suite-desktop
description: Desktop application for test suite automation tools
author: Test Suite Team

scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run backend:dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && wait-on http://localhost:8000/health && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && electron-builder --linux
